ski.name: GREAT FLAMING HAMMER
desc: Young Yanbing jumps into the air and engulfs the enemy units with the ferocious flames of the Great Yama, dealing area damage. Flame Buff: Improves damage and slows the affected units. stacks improve damage and slow effect.

ski.name: EXPLODING FLAMES
desc: Receives Flames periodically to improve both armor and spell Resist. Every release activates a Flame stack for 10s. While activated, adds fire damage to basic attacks, making the same target hit by 3 fire attack(s) take additional damage. While activated, using the skill again will consume all Flame stacks to boost the skill.
data: Normal Attack Fire Physical Damage per Flame Stack: 30/40/50/60
study: Improves both armor and spell Resist. Activate to improve normal attacks or the skill itself.
update: Improves both passive and activated effects. Improves charge speed.

ski.name: LORD OF THE FLAMES
desc: Raises the Great Yama up to charge a great fireball. Immune to control effects while charging. Release the skill again to unleash the fireball to deal massive damage to the target area. Flame Buff: Gains Damage Reduction by 15% every stack. The explosion deals area DoT and inflicts an additional Slow effect by 40% for 3s.
data: Area Magical Continuous Damage: 10/15/20 per stack
study: Deals damage to the target area after charging

ski.name: YAMA CANNON
desc: Controls Great Yama to launch a powerful fire pillar to deal damage to the enemy units on its path, exploding when hitting enemy heroes to deal area damage. Flame Buff: 4% Additional damage related to enemy units' Max HP per stack.
study: Deals damage to enemy units in a straight line
